v0.0.1: the fnf hd mod has been added! shoutouts to yello for bf hd sprite: Yello's page notes: the parents in week 5 kinda look small, the henchmen in week 4 background only have 1 frame of animation, dad in week 1 looks kinda glitchy, same with pico, the lights in week 3 are just yellow, the upper characters in week 5 are static, and the background on week 4 is blurry
